about_the_game:
Way of the Samurai 3 - Weapon Set
40 exclusive weapon parts to create 9 unique swords and the ‘Arquebus’ spear.
DLC weapon parts must be purchased from Uriko’s ‘DLC Market’, found at Guard Gate. (20 Yen each.)
